title: (LFP) Pref Dia 5+
body:
Add Wolves

Looking for duo buddy

I realistically want to make it to challenger and happy to put in the effort

replies.body:
Hi there Wolves! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
